sections.title: Water Closets and Urinals
sections.exact_text_en: Except as permitted by Articles 3.7.2.3. to 3.7.2.6., the minimum number of water closets required for each sex in a building shall be determined in accordance with Table 3.7.2.1.
sections.exact_text_fr: Sauf dans les cas prévus aux articles 3.7.2.3. à 3.7.2.6., le nombre minimal de cuvettes de cabinet d'aisances exigé pour chaque sexe dans un bâtiment doit être déterminé conformément au tableau 3.7.2.1.

sections.title: Water closets in barrier-free washrooms
sections.exact_text_en: At least one water closet in a barrier-free washroom shall conform to Article 3.8.3.11.
sections.exact_text_fr: Au moins une cuvette de cabinet d'aisances dans une salle de toilettes sans obstacles doit être conforme à l'article 3.8.3.11.

sections.title: Minimum Number of Water Closets
sections.exact_text_en: Office Buildings: Males - 1 per 75 persons or part thereof; Females - 1 per 40 persons or part thereof
sections.exact_text_fr: Bâtiments de bureaux: Hommes - 1 par 75 personnes ou fraction de ce nombre; Femmes - 1 par 40 personnes ou fraction de ce nombre

sections.title: Alberta Amendment - Enhanced Worker Facilities
sections.exact_text_en: For industrial buildings in cold climate zones, the fixture count shall be increased by providing 1 water closet per 70 males (instead of 75) to accommodate enhanced worker welfare requirements during extreme weather conditions.
sections.source_document: Alberta Building Code 2019 - Amendment to NBC

sections.title: Minimum number of fixtures
sections.exact_text_en: Plumbing fixtures shall be provided in the minimum number as shown in Table 2902.1 based on the actual use of the building or space.

text_fragments.exact_text_en: Plumbing fixtures shall be provided in the minimum number as shown in Table 2902.1

sections.title: Minimum Number of Required Plumbing Fixtures
sections.exact_text_en: Business (B): Male - 1 water closet per 25 for the first 50 and 1 per 50 for the remainder exceeding 50; Female - 1 water closet per 25 for the first 50 and 1 per 50 for the remainder exceeding 50
